level.heading: Standards for grant and contract awards.
level.text: After consultation with the Commission on Aging established by § 7-504.01 the Director shall develop and publish the standards that the Office will use in making decisions on the award of grants and contracts.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-501.01.
